# teamcity_project (Resource)


## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "teamcity_project" "provider" {
  name = "Project 1"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `id` (String) Project ID. Autogenerated by default.

## Import

```terraform
import {
  to = teamcity_project.project1
  id = "Project1"
}
```
